As the pandemic rages, Trump indulges his obsessions With the pandemic exploding and setting record infection rates, President Donald Trump spent the weekend on his own often divisive obsessions, piling up new evidence for detractors who say he's not fit for office.

The world isn't laughing at America -- it's pitying us One of Trump's big election lines in 2016 was that the world was laughing at America.
